name: Elves vs Goblins Mahjongg World
description:
Darkness descends upon the land of elves and goblins. Black clouds of smoke rise from the deep fiery maw of the volcano at Sparkle Mountain.
They spread and with them gloom and cruel curses ...

Experience an exciting Mahjongg adventure in the land of these lovable and strange creatures.
Play through numerous, varied levels, solve hidden object and mini-games, find bonuses and hidden levels.
Will you succeed in banishing the dark magic and freeing the inhabitants from its spell?
Also, enjoy a relaxing round of Mahjongg in the "Free Game" with many levels in two different game variants!


- Exciting and magical Mahjongg adventure!
- Thrilling mini-games and HO scenes
- Hidden extras and hidden levels
- Gorgeous tile-sets and two variants
- Free play with two Mahjongg variants
